Guide to Quiz

This is a fun quiz to test your knowledge of Christmas songs. Some of them are carols and others are songs that appeared in the charts.

The songs story or theme will be described in a paragraph of text. Your job is to workout which song is being referenced. Then select the answer using the options and click submit. You will then be told if you got the question right or wrong and the score box will update you. Then the new songs paragraph will appear with new options.

Good Luck!
